titleStmt.title: The OpenText.org Syntactically Annotated Greek New Testament

availability.p: This annotation has been produced by OpenText.org. It should not be cited or distributed without proper attribution.

notesStmt.note: These files contain the original v0.11 syntax annotations, but they have been converted to a new, inline XML format by Christopher D. Land and the base text has been corrected and updated to the NA28. Together, these developments have resulted in minor changes to the annotation.
Corrections are welcome either through GitHub, the project website (www.opentext.org), or a direct email to Christopher D. Land.

Because the files represent (more-or-less) the original annotation, they will not be maintained. All interim corrections or updates will be released in the OpenText 1.5 repository, until we are ready for the release of OpenText 2.0.

sourceDesc.p: The text is that of Novum Testamentum Graece, 28th revised edition, edited by Barbara Aland et al. (Stuttgart: Deutsche Bibelgesellschaft, 2012).
